data.eml:eml: Four new species and additional records of Domene and Lathrobium from the Dayao Mountains, southern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Zhong, Sun, Zhuo, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2015): Four new species and additional records of Domene and Lathrobium from the Dayao Mountains, southern China. ZooKeys 508: 113-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.508.9682, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.508.9682
